name: Ex Imperum
description:
Use the right buttons to select an ability.

WASD move screen. Scrollwhell zoom Out/In.

Ex- Imperium is a game where you play as an unstable god trying to help the villagers from your own powers going out of control, you need to protect the villager and temple from enemies and disasters which will drive you into madness if they continue.

Made in two days for the Game Makers Toolkit Game Jam.
